content:
I am an independent scientist, working under the name ELKMO. My clients include the Steinegger lab at SNU.
Before that I was a postdoc with Dr. Johannes Söding at MPIBPC, where I developed tools for the analysis of eukaryotic metagenomic data.
Before that, I did my PhD at TAU under the joint supervision of Prof. Tal Pupko and Prof. Itay Mayrose. My work focused on statistical techniques in molecular evolution.

title: Eli Levy Karin
